mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE ID = #{userId} AND STATUS != 'Q'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES(EMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), NULL, NULL, NULL, TO_DATE(#{join_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), NULL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, NULL, SYSDATE, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.DEPT_NAME, C.JOB_NAME, D.CHANGE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN JOB C ON A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT D ON A.FILE_NO = D.FILE_NO WHERE A.ID = #{id} AND A.STATUS != 'Q'
SELECT EMP_NO, NAME, JOB_NAME AS JOB_CODE FROM EMPLOYEE A JOIN JOB B ON A.JOB_CODE = B.JOB_CODE WHERE A.JOB_CODE < #{job_code} AND DEPT_CODE = #{dept_code}
mapper.update:
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET NAME = #{name}, DEPT_CODE = #{dept_code}, UPPER_DEPT_CODE = #{upper_dept_code}, JOB_CODE = #{job_code}, BIRTH = TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, FILE_NO = #{file_no}, JOIN_DATE = #{join_date}
WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.DEPT_NAME, C.JOB_NAME, D.CHANGE_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE LEFT JOIN JOB C ON A.JOB_CODE = C.JOB_CODE LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT D ON A.FILE_NO = D.FILE_NO WHERE EMP_NO = #{emp_no}
SELECT UPPER_DEPT_CODE FROM DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_CODE = #{dept_code}

SELECT A.NAME, A.DEPT_NAME FROM (SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.NAME, C.DEPT_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A JOIN WORK_TIME B ON A.EMP_NO=B.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON A.DEPT_CODE=C.DEPT_CODE WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.IN_TIME) = #{month} AND TO_CHAR(IN_TIME, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') GROUP BY A.EMP_NO, A.NAME, C.DEPT_NAME ORDER BY SUM(B.OUT_TIME-B.IN_TIME) DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE ADMIN='Y'
